item.text: Joseph was no longer able to control himself before all his attendants, so he cried out, “Make everyone go out from my presence!” No one remained with Joseph when he made himself known to his brothers.
He wept loudly; the Egyptians heard it and Pharaoh’s household heard about it.
Joseph said to his brothers, “I am Joseph! Is my father still alive?” His brothers could not answer him because they were dumbfounded before him.

<st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>, “<st data-num="05066 04994">Come closer</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me,” so they <st data-num="05066" class="">came near</st>. Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you <st data-num="04376" class="">sold</st> into <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st>, do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="06087" class="">upset</st> and do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02734" class="">be angry</st> with <st data-num="05869" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="04376" class="">sold</st> me <st data-num="02008" class="">here</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> me<n id="2" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">ahead of</st> you to <st data-num="04241" class="">preserve life</st>!

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> past two <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> there has been <st data-num="07458" class="">famine</st> <st data-num="07130" class="">in</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and for <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">more</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">there</st> will <st data-num="0369" class="">be neither</st> <st data-num="02758" class="">plowing</st> nor <st data-num="07105" class="">harvesting</st>.

<st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> me<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">ahead of</st> you to <st data-num="07760 07611">preserve</st> you<n id="2" /> on the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> and to <st data-num="02421" class="">save</st> your <st data-num="02421" class="">lives</st><n id="3" /> by a <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="06413" class="">deliverance</st>.

So <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st>, it is <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> who <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> me <st data-num="02008" class="">here</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">but</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>. He has <st data-num="07760" class="">made</st> me an <st data-num="01" class="">adviser</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st>, <st data-num="0113" class="">lord</st> over <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> his <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st>, and <st data-num="04910" class="">ruler</st> over <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>.

Now <st data-num="05927" class="">go up</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> my <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="04116" class="">quickly</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0559 0413">tell</st> him, ‘<st data-num="03541" class="">This is what</st> your <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">says</st>: “<st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="07760" class="">made</st> me <st data-num="0113" class="">lord</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>. <st data-num="03381" class="">Come down</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me; do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05975" class="">delay</st>!

You will <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="01657" class="">Goshen</st>, and you will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="07138 0413">near</st> me—<st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, your <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st>, your <st data-num="01121 01121">grandchildren</st>, your <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st>, your <st data-num="01241" class="">herds</st>, and <st data-num="03605 0834">everything</st> you have.

I will <st data-num="03557" class="">provide</st> you <st data-num="03557" class="">with food</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> there will be <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">more</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> of <st data-num="07458" class="">famine</st>. <st data-num="06435" class="">Otherwise</st> you would <st data-num="03423" class="">become poor</st>—<st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, your <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">everyone</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> belongs to you.”’

<st data-num="05869" class="">You</st> and my <st data-num="05869 0251">brother</st> <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> can <st data-num="02009" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> with your own <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">I</st> really am the one who <st data-num="01696" class="">speaks</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you.<n id="1" />
So tell my father about all my honor in Egypt and about everything you have seen. But bring my father down here quickly!”
Then he threw himself on the neck of his brother Benjamin and wept, and Benjamin wept on his neck.
He kissed all his brothers and wept over them. After this his brothers talked with him.
Now it was reported in the household of Pharaoh, “Joseph’s brothers have arrived.” It pleased Pharaoh and his servants.

<st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st>, “<st data-num="0559" class="">Say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> your <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>, ‘<st data-num="06213" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st>: <st data-num="02943" class="">Load</st> your <st data-num="01165" class="">animals</st> and <st data-num="01980 0935">go</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaan</st>!

<st data-num="03947" class="">Get</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and your <st data-num="01004" class="">households</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me! Then I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="02898" class="">best</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> and you will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="02459" class="">best</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.’

<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> are also <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> to say,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="06213" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st>: <st data-num="03947" class="">Take</st> for yourselves <st data-num="05699" class="">wagons</st> from the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> for your <st data-num="02945" class="">little ones</st> and for your <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st>. <st data-num="05375" class="">Bring</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st>.
Don’t worry about your belongings, for the best of all the land of Egypt will be yours.’”
So the sons of Israel did as he said. Joseph gave them wagons as Pharaoh had instructed, and he gave them provisions for the journey.

He <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="02487" class="">sets</st> of <st data-num="08071" class="">clothes</st> to <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">one</st> of them,<n id="1" /> but to <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> he <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="07969 03967" class="">300</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">pieces of silver</st> and <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="02487" class="">sets</st> of <st data-num="08071" class="">clothes</st>.<n id="2" />

To his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> he <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> the <st data-num="02063" class="">following</st>:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06235" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="02543" class="">donkeys</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">loaded</st> with the <st data-num="02898" class="">best products</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> and <st data-num="06235" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="0860" class="">female donkeys</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">loaded</st> with <st data-num="01250" class="">grain</st>, <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st>, and <st data-num="04202" class="">provisions</st> for his <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">journey</st>.
Then he sent his brothers on their way and they left. He said to them, “As you travel don’t be overcome with fear.”
So they went up from Egypt and came to their father Jacob in the land of Canaan.

They <st data-num="05046 0559">told</st> him, “<st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> is <st data-num="05750" class="">still</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">alive</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">and</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is <st data-num="04910" class="">ruler</st> over <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>!” <st data-num="03820" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="06313" class="">was stunned</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> he did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0539" class="">believe</st> them.

But when they <st data-num="01696" class="">related</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him <st data-num="03605 01697">everything</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> had <st data-num="0834 01696">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them,<n id="1" /> and when he <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="05699" class="">wagons</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> had <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> to <st data-num="05375" class="">transport</st> him, their <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob’s</st> <st data-num="07307" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">revived</st>.
Then Israel said, “Enough! My son Joseph is still alive! I will go and see him before I die.”
